effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user hurls mud in the target’s face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage. Incoming moves also become more likely to miss.
